title: Dean Koontz - Dragon Tears [Audiobook]
description:
Dragon Tears By Dean Koontz
                        [Audiobook]


Koontz&#039;s current best-seller relates the story of two Southern California police 
detectives who track down a demonic serial killer with paranormal abilities. 
The work is well-suited to audio, and fans of Koontz should enjoy this exceptional 
production. Jay O. Sanders is simply superb. All characters (even Woofer, a dog who 
plays an important role) are fully voiced. One of the characterizations, the golem
is so strikingly different from Sanders&#039;s "normal" voice that it&#039;s difficult at first 
to recognize that it&#039;s still Sanders speaking.

---------------------------------
Release Date....October 1, 1993
---------------------------------

PLEASE SEED WHEN YOU FINISH THE DOWNLOAD.

Enjoy!!
